content: this pattern is for a life-size crochet fried egg that can be used as a pin cushion or toy in kid s playroom it is made of two parts that are sewn together and it takes about 1 5 hours to complete the pattern is based on crocheting in a spiral and written in us terms you will need - dmc natura just cotton 01-ibiza - dmc natura just cotton 16-tournesol - 3mm crochet hook - 2 stitch markers - scissors - yarn needle - some toy stuffing for more detailed instructions and photo tutorial visit https //manyevenings com/en/how-to-make-the-perfect-fried-egg
